agent.name: Name
agent.version_upgrade: This will upgrade the agent version to
agent.set_actions_corresponding_rule: Set actions for the corresponding rule
agent.rule_action_executed: Rule on when the action has to be executed

agent_helper.agent_desc1: Add a new Agent to push the data via MQTT. Select the appropriate Agent Type. Select 'Facilio' if you are going to install Facilio Java Agent. Select 'Niagara' if you are using Niagara to push the data. Select 'Custom' for other type of agents.
agent_helper.agent_desc3: Shuts down the selected agent(s). Once shutdown agent will not be able to send the data, until the agent is manually started by a person or a service.
agent_helper.agent_desc4: Upgrade the selected agent(s), Select the version to upgrade the agent. This is only supported for type 'Facilio'.
agent_helper.agent_desc6: Number of controllers available in the agent
agent_helper.agent_desc7: Location where the agent is deployed
agent_helper.agent_desc8: When was the data last sent by the agent
agent_helper.agent_desc9: Interval at which the agent will poll the values for the configured points.
agent_helper.agent_desc10: Does the agent allow setting values from the server.

agent_overview_helper.agent_overview_desc1: Overview of the all agents, controllers, points in this organization.
agent_overview_helper.agent_overview_desc3: This page lists all available controllers in each agent according to their types selected.
agent_overview_helper.agent_overview_desc4: This page lists all available points in each controller.
agent_overview_helper.agent_overview_desc5: This page lets you map the data points of the controllers to the readings of the virtual assets created in the Facilio cloud.
agent_overview_helper.agent_overview_desc6: This page lists all the available alarms pertaining to each agent in this Organization.
agent_overview_helper.agent_overview_desc7: This page lets you configure the notifications such as email,sms for the alarms raised for each agent.
agent_overview_helper.agent_overview_desc8: This page shows the metrics of messages sent by each agent with it’s publish type.
agent_overview_helper.agent_overview_desc9: This page shows the details of the commands and it’s execution status in the agent.
agent_overview_helper.agent_overview_desc10: This page shows the last 20 data received by the server.

alarm_mapping.alarm_mapping_remove_msg: Are you sure you want to remove

delete.are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_tri: Are you sure you want to delete this trigger?
